revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Yes, this is P. Ammon 1 20 (recto) AND P. Ammon 1 21 (verso) becoming P. Ammon 2 43, with additional fragments (finalizer, beware, you need to rename it, and make sure there are links from P. Ammon 1 20 and 21 to this... Good luck!). Line 1, remove προισταμέ̣[νου] from the alt:. Line 4, at the end -> ὑ̣π̣ὸ̣ <:[.?]|alt:|[τὴν](?):>. Line 5 -> .13τ̣ι̣.3 (τ has underdot); in alt:, ως.1α̣.2υ̣ -> ωσ.1α̣.2υ̣. Not sure in line 5bis shouldn't removed and inserted in line 6 (the problem being we don't know where it should be inserted); it should at least be numbered as belonging to line 6, not line 5 (see the index in the volume); -> 6bis. \〚[.?].3τ̣.1ι̣αν〛/ . Line 6 starts with [.6].2ε̣τα̣ί; further on the line, -> [.6].6[.5]ν̣.2 (pace Sosin). Line 7, -> <:ο.2ς|alt:|ὅπ̣ω̣ς:> καὶ αὐτὸς .1[.6]ε̣ιν. Line 6bis -> 7bis. \[.?]ι.3ι̣ γ̣ὰ̣ρ̣ τ̣ου̣[.6].2 <:.3ερ̣υ.4ντ̣.2λ̣λ̣.3|alt:|<:ἧ̣ι̣π̣ερ̣ ὕστ̣ε̣ρ̣ο̣ν τ̣ὸ̣ ἄ̣λ̣λ̣ο̣ .3|alt:|ἧ̣ι̣π̣ερ̣ ὕστ̣ε̣ρ̣ο̣ν τ̣ὰ̣ ἄ̣λ̣λ̣α .3(?):>(?):>/. Line 8bis -> 9bis. \[.?] ε.4[.?]μ̣εν̣ο̣.1/. Line 9, -⟩ <:[παράστασιν] [.4].2|alt:|[παράστασιν εἰς ἐ]μ̣ὲ̣(?):> π̣[ε]ποίηκεν. After line 10 (see Sosin) -> 11. lost.ca.4lin ("ca. 5 lines", edd., but the 5th lost line will be our line 15. Line 16 -> .1π̣.4 τ̣ε̣λ̣ευτ̣[ησα][.1]. Line 17, check apostrophe in κατ’ (looks weird on my screen...). Line 28, move final [.?] out of the alt:. After line 28, I would write 29. lost.ca.5lin. Pace Sosin, I think lines 39-40 should be marked as it is, minf, inverse ("am unteren Rand von Fr. a Verso, zwei Zeilen, die auf dem Kopf stehen" edd.; checked on plate).
Vote - AcceptText - If I udnerstand, this content should be deleted and replaced with reprint In redirect (in XML) pointing to reedition in Ammon 2.43, on which see my voting comments already

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. If I understand, the text for P.Ammon 1.21 must be deleted and a reprint redirect inserted in the XML. Lin6 [.5] ν̣ --> [.6]ν̣; lin7--> αὐτὸς:> .1; lin8--> Ἀλε[ξανδρε][.3].1; after lin10 del ca.5lin and add 10. lost.?lin; lin15bis--> 15. ; before lin15 add 15. lost.?lin; lin15 „ --> "; after lin28del ca.5lin and add 28. lost.?lin; before lin34 add 34. lost.?lin; after lin38--> 38. vac.?; last 2 lin should be inside .v,FrA (create a div for verso fragmA) and the lin numbers should be 39,minf and 40,minf (not inverse)
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
